name: !farewell channel #channel
description: Beetle will send all farewell messages in #channel

name: !farewell message { content }
description: Set custom content message when someone leaves your server, use placeholders {pinguser}, {username}, {usertag}, {userid}, {servername}, {usernickname}, {membercount}, {membercount_ordinal}, {createdat}, {joinedat} to replace for specific value content

name: !farewell message reset
description: Reset custom content message to default

name: !farewell embed enable
description: Enable embed farewell message on your server

name: !farewell embed disable
description: Disable embed farewell message on your server

name: !farewell embed title { content }
description: Set custom embed title message content, you can also use placeholders

name: !farewell embed title reset
description: Reset custom embed message title to default

name: !farewell embed description { content }
description: Set custom embed description message content, you can also use placeholders

name: !farewell embed description reset
description: Reset embed description content to default

name: !farewell embed thumbnail [ {usericon}, {servericon} ]
description: Set custom embed thumbnail, use {usericon}, {servericon} to display specific value or use `reset` to remove

name: !farewell embed color #XXXXXX
description: Set custom embed color, use `reset` to reset back to default #FFFFFF

name: !farewell embed footer { content }
description: Set custom embed footer, placeholder support soon...

name: !farewell embed footer reset
description: Reset embed footer to default (none display)
